attributes.action: Increase the Guaranted protection  to savers from £35,000 to £50,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people with savings accounts need to be sure of their money.  They are the ones who pay the taxes which are distributed to the feckless and need some assurance that it is worth saving and not spending their monies.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
